Text.Value: No, but I know you. I was told to keep watch for you and point you towards home, should you ever appear.
Use your shared connection. Urge Shadowheart to lie.
Of course not. A cover, to throw our enemies of the scent. I suppose you weren't deemed important enough to be informed of the plan.

EditorData.NodeContext: Overall Arc: Shadowheart has rejected Shar and is on a mission to Baldur's Gate to save her captive parents.

Text.Value: Let Shadowheart handle it.
Bold of you - brave, even. Though do not assume passing admiration will translate to mercy when you kneel before the Mother Superior.
Very well. First, you need to continue onwards into the Lower City.

EditorData.NodeContext: Indifferent shrug on 'very well' ('it's your head')

Text.Value: Your friend is inquisitive. A dangerous trait. Are you sure you want him listening in on this?
Your friend is inquisitive. A dangerous trait. Are you sure you want her listening in on this?
Your friend is inquisitive. A dangerous trait. Are you sure you want them listening in on this?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Ferg tosses the player a cold look before returning his attention to Shadowheart, addressing her.

Text.Value: I have... strayed, it is true. But I have returned to make amends. I will put my fate in the Mother Superior's hands, and trust that Lady Shar will guide her.

EditorData.NodeContext: Bluffing. Overall Arc: Shadowheart has rejected Shar and is on a mission to Baldur's Gate to save her captive parents.

Text.Value: Can't you show me yourself?

EditorData.NodeContext: Overall arc: Shadowheart has been blessed by her goddess Shar after sacrificing Nightsong. She is now on a mission to seize control of Shar's church and followers in Baldur's Gate

Text.Value: That would have been fine deception, in most cases. But your lying tongue cannot mask the empty pit in your spirit. She truly has abandoned you.

EditorData.NodeContext: Cold smile. He hasn't fallen for a lie.

Text.Value: I just lost a wager, thanks to you.
Tell me one thing... Is there someone called Rennald there? A tiefling with short horns and purple hair.

EditorData.NodeContext: Referring to a memory fragment she had restored previously, hinting at a childhood friend she can't remember. Overall Arc: Shadowheart has rejected Shar and is on a mission to Baldur's Gate to save her captive parents.

Text.Value: Besides, I have business to attend to, wares to sell. Our great endeavour cannot run on faith alone - we need funds. Have a look, if you wish.
Let Shadowheart handle it.
Mother Superior sent you? Go on, then - where do I go?

EditorData.NodeContext: Overall arc: Shadowheart has been blessed by her goddess Shar after sacrificing Nightsong. She is now on a mission to seize control of Shar's church and followers in Baldur's Gate

Text.Value: You're a Sharran, aren't you? From Shadowheart's cloister.
I can't help but feel the strangest twinge of disgust as I look upon you. Is it true? Has our Lady forsaken you?
Tell me one thing... Is there someone called Rennald there? A tiefling boy, or possibly a man now.

EditorData.NodeContext: Referring to a memory fragment she had restored previously, hinting at a childhood friend she can't remember. Overall arc: Shadowheart has been blessed by her goddess Shar after sacrificing Nightsong. She is now on a mission to seize control of Shar's church and followers in Baldur's Gate

Text.Value: What a sight for sore eyes. I believe there's somewhere you're supposed to be, no? Long overdue, in fact.
Otherwise, I think we're done. Try not to dawdle too much in the city - Mother's waiting.
Who are you?

EditorData.NodeContext: Overall Arc: Shadowheart has rejected Shar and is on a mission to Baldur's Gate to save her captive parents.

Text.Value: Though if I was you, I'd be very tempted to just forget it all and disappear. You have some form at doing so, after all.
And lo, you have appeared.
Remain silent.
I'm afraid the quarrel is unavoidable, thanks to you.
Oh no, I must remain here. In truth, I'm glad to keep my distance for now... There's been some tension in the ranks. It seems a great deal is riding on the outcome of your mission.
Hush - this is between myself and Shadowheart. There have been whispers about you, sister. About your faith, your loyalty...

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: First line addressed to player, second line to Shadowheart
EditorData.NodeContext: First line addressed to player, second line to Shadowheart

Text.Value: Now I must report your reappearance. If you are intent on bringing matters to a head, then seek out the House of Grief, in the Lower City.
Oh, don't be so harsh - it's plain to see that you've turned heretic, even if your friend had kept his mouth shut.
Oh, don't be so harsh - it's plain to see that you've turned heretic, even if your friend had kept her mouth shut.
Oh, don't be so harsh - it's plain to see that you've turned heretic, even if your friend had kept their mouth shut.
Rennald... Now there's a name I haven't heard in some time. But not for me to spoil what Lady Shar would keep hidden from you. Best if you looked for yourself.
Spit it out, then. Where's she supposed to go?
I met your friend already - he's inquisitive. A dangerous trait. Are you sure you want him listening in on this?
I met your friend already - she's inquisitive. A dangerous trait. Are you sure you want her listening in on this?
I met your friend already - they're inquisitive. A dangerous trait. Are you sure you want them listening in on this?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Ferg tosses the player a cold look before returning his attention to Shadowheart, addressing her.

Text.Value: I suppose that's the subtle approach dispensed with.

EditorData.NodeContext: Exasperated. Overall Arc: Shadowheart has rejected Shar and is on a mission to Baldur's Gate to save her captive parents.

Text.Value: There have been whispers about you, sister. About your faith, your loyalty...
There have been whispers about you, sister. About your faith, your loyalty... your company.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Ferg tosses the player a cold look before returning his attention to Shadowheart, addressing her.

Text.Value: Reach out to her psionically. She should plead contrition, for now.
You're a Sharran, aren't you? From Shadowheart's cloister.
Yes, I trust him. Whatever you have to say, say it.
Yes, I trust her. Whatever you have to say, say it.
Yes, I trust them. Whatever you have to say, say it.

EditorData.NodeContext: Overall arc: Shadowheart has been blessed by her goddess Shar after sacrificing Nightsong. She is now on a mission to seize control of Shar's church and followers in Baldur's Gate

Text.Value: So close to home and yet you need a guiding hand. Amazing how malleable - or fragile - the mind can be. First, you need to continue onwards into the Lower City.
Our hearts bleed for you. Get to the point.
Do I know you?

EditorData.NodeContext: Overall arc: Shadowheart has been blessed by her goddess Shar after sacrificing Nightsong. She is now on a mission to seize control of Shar's church and followers in Baldur's Gate

Text.Value: I know the truth. I know my parents still live. Tell me where they are, and I have no quarrel with you.

EditorData.NodeContext: Direct, Overall Arc: Shadowheart has rejected Shar and is on a mission to Baldur's Gate to save her captive parents.

Text.Value: Who sent you?
She has turned her back on your wretched goddess.

Then seek out a place called the House of Grief. It may not be quite what you expect, but I assure you it's the right spot. Go there, and make yourself known. You will be given the welcome you deserve.
Your friend is unsubtle. A dangerous trait. Are you sure you want him listening in on this?
Your friend is unsubtle. A dangerous trait. Are you sure you want her listening in on this?
Your friend is unsubtle. A dangerous trait. Are you sure you want them listening in on this?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Ferg tosses the player a cold look before returning his attention to Shadowheart, addressing her.

Text.Value: Rennald... Now there is a name I haven't heard in a while. He is no more. I'll leave the rest for you to find out, heretic.
Someone who bet that you'd never be foolish enough to actually show your face in this city again. But here you are, and the gold in my purse is soon to take flight.

Synopsis: Ferg, a Sharran Informer is Shadowheart's contact for her to reach out to when completing her mission. He impresses they have been waiting for her return. If on the Shar Path he will reveal that there is a chance for Shadowheart to take over. If not, he will be deeply skeptical of Shadowheart.
